app.revision_history: Added possibility of SoC prototyping (CPU and FPGA)
app.name: protoip
app.author: Bulat Khusainov
app.summary: Protoip is a utility for quickly prototyping C-based IP in FPGA hardware

proc.name: ip_design_build
proc.summary: Build the IP XACT of the project according to the specification in [WORKING DIRECTORY]/doc/project_name/ip_configuration_parameters.txt using Vivado HLS.

proc.name: ip_design_build_debug
proc.summary: Open the project named 'project_name' in the Vivado HLS GUI.

proc.name: ip_design_test
proc.summary: Run a C/RTL simulation of the project named 'project_name' according to the specification in [WORKING DIRECTORY]/doc/project_name/ip_configuration_parameters.txt using Vivado HLS.

proc.name: ip_design_test_debug
proc.summary: Open the project named 'project_name' in the Vivado HLS GUI to run a C/RTL simulation.

proc.name: ip_prototype_build
proc.summary: Build the IP prototype of the project according to the specification in [WORKING DIRECTORY]/doc/project_name/ip_configuration_parameters.txt using Vivado.

proc.name: ip_prototype_build_debug
proc.summary: Open Vivado GUI to debug the project named 'project_name' according to the project configuration parameters [WORKING DIRECTORY]/doc/project_name/ip_configuration_parameters.txt

proc.name: ip_prototype_load
proc.summary: Build the FPGA Ethernet server application using SDK according to the specification in [WORKING DIRECTORY]/design_parameters.tcl and program the FPGA. A connected evaluation board is required.

proc.name: ip_prototype_load_debug
proc.summary: Open SDK to debug the the FPGA Ethernet server running on the FPGA ARM processor.

proc.name: ip_prototype_test
proc.summary: Run a test of the IP prototype named 'project_name' according to the specification in [WORKING DIRECTORY]/doc/project_name/ip_configuration_parameters.txt. A connected evaluation board is required.

proc.name: make_rand_stimuli
proc.summary: Create input vectors with random data (-5,5) to be used as stimuli by ip_design_test.

proc.name: make_template
proc.summary: Build the IP prototype project template in the current working directory

proc.name: soc_prototype_load
proc.summary: Build user's code (from soc_user.c and soc_user.h files) and the FPGA Ethernet server application using SDK according to the specification in [WORKING DIRECTORY]/design_parameters.tcl and program the FPGA. A connected evaluation board is required.

proc.name: soc_prototype_load_debug
proc.summary: Open SDK to debug user's code (from soc_user.c and soc_user.h files) and the the FPGA Ethernet server running on the FPGA ARM processor.

proc.name: soc_prototype_test
proc.summary: Run a test of the SOC named 'project_name' according to the specification in [WORKING DIRECTORY]/doc/project_name/ip_configuration_parameters.txt. A connected evaluation board is required.
